I loved the pair I got for Christmas so much I got 2 more! Dark Gray, Wine Red (almost a washed burgundy look, not dark) and Navy (which isn't a dark navy, more like a medium blue). These are medium weight, super soft, loose fit but not sloppy and wash well. They are long enough and haven't shrunk after washing/drying. I'm 5'5 average weight and got medium because I like a looser fit. The pockets are normal. I can put my cell in for a short time but wouldn't leave it there for brisk walking, etc. I can actually work out in these without overheating then take the dog outside without freezing.

Purchased a large and I love the fit. If you have thick thighs they will not be baggy, but they are stretchy and comfortable.  Will purchase more. Very happy with my purchase. Can wear them anytime of the year the material isn't thick.

These joggers should have been great. The fabric is soft and relatively light, comfortable on the skin. The fit was quite loose everywhere, except the waist. I could have sized down, but would need to go up a size to have a comfortable waist. Frustrating since there's a drawstring so the tight elastic is unnecessary. Returning it and trying something else.

Absolutely LOVE these!!! The material is silky smooth. I was leary when it suggested buying a larger size than normal, but very happy I did. Most comfortable pants ever! I have ordered another pair in a different color.

Not that comfortable.

Simple, soft sweats.
